code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import{fetchData}from"../services/api";import"chartjs-adapter-moment";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChartComponent=_ref=>{let{symbol,label}=_ref;const[chartData,setChartData]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{const getData=async()=>{try{const data=await fetchData(symbol);const timestamps=data.map(row=>row.timestamp);const exchangeRates=data.map(row=>parseFloat(row.exchangeRate));setChartData({labels:timestamps,datasets:[{label,data:exchangeRates,borderColor:"rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)",borderWidth:1,fill:false}]});}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);}};getData();},[symbol,label]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[label," Exchange Rate"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:chartData,options:{scales:{x:{type:"time",time:{unit:"minute"}},y:{beginAtZero:false}}}})]});};export default ChartComponent;
